token_expired_alert_text: Por favor inicie sesión de nuevo para continuar.
name: Nombre
send_password_reset_link: Enviar Enlace de Restablecimiento de Contraseña
connect_with_wave: SP Connect with your fan-base, accumulate & implement analytics,and help create the WAVE.
keeping_favourite_creatives_difficult: SP Keeping up with the latest content & projects from your favourite creatives shouldn´t be so difficult
why_different_platforms: SP Why go to ten different platforms to find them when you could just come to one?
it_is_time_to_stop_chasing_them_around_t: SP It is time to stop chasing them around the web.
register_today: Register today to get them to come to you.
the_platforms: SP The platform´s features help to keep you one click away from thelatest & greatest from your favourite creators, and give you all of the tools you´d need to find new ones.
help_them_to_help_you: SP Help them to help you
your_basic_interaction: SP Your basic interaction with their profiles & projects helps creators understand what you´re looking for, and how & where to give it to you.
your_continued_support: SP Your continued support means everything to these creatives. It´s just been hard for them to see it-until now. The feedback we givethem can help them seek sponsorship for their profile or projects, which means better content for you!
so_how_do_we_do_it: SP So how do we do it?
right_now_big: SP Right now big businesses are profiting from what they call your behaviours.
sadly_give_theri_best_stuff_that_way_eve: SP Sadly, you don´t really see any of that come back to help you or the talent you are trying to support. LOC changes that. You only tell us what´s relevant to helping creators give theri best stuff. That way, everybody wins.
we_industry_grant_fund: SP We´ve developed what we´re calling the IGF-the Industry Grant Fund.
community_projects_the_supports: SP If it´s your data helping people earn money, we believe you should be rewarded for it. We pledge to put back 60% of our total advertising & sponsorship revenue to the IGF. Our creators are doing the same; 25c of their subscription every week is put towards the industry & community projects the IGF supports.
we_want_the_best_for_our: SP We want the best for our talent creators, because the best for them means the best for you.
we_want_to_see_more_films: SP We want to see more films, more television & web series, more live music. We want the best conditions for our musicians, photographers, event planners, actors. writers - all of them.
we_want_to_raise_the_ceiling: SP We want to raise the ceiling.
we_think_to_do_that_we_just_need_to_be_a: SP We think to do that, we just need to be a little bit..
lorem_ipsum_dolor_sit_amet_consectetur_a: SP Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Aenean erat risus, iaculis sit amet auctor in, vestibulum sit amet dolor. Vestibulum hendrerit eros sit amet pretium faucibus.
enter_email_or_phone_number: SP Enter email or phone number
i_agree_with_terms_conditions: SP I agree with Terms & Conditions
you_must_agree_before_submitting: SP You must agree before submitting.
we_recommend_you: SP We want to recommend you the best art events in your city.
this_image_will: SP This image will be the cover of your profile
have_you_forgotten_your_password: SP Have you forgotten your password?
